Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath

Interface TerminologyConcepts

All Known Implementing Classes:
TerminologyConcepts.Set, TerminologyConcepts.Union
public sealed interface TerminologyConcepts permits TerminologyConcepts.Set, TerminologyConcepts.Union
Represents a set of concepts, which can be either a single concept or a union of multiple concepts.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    TerminologyConcepts.Set
    Represents a collection of codings.
    static class 
    TerminologyConcepts.Union
    Represents a collection of union of codings which represent a single concept.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      @Nonnull ColumnRepresentation apply(@Nonnull String name, @Nonnull ColumnRepresentation... args)
      Apply a user defined function to this set of concepts.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the UDF
      args - the arguments to the UDF
      Returns:
      the result of applying the UDF

    • flatten

      @Nonnull TerminologyConcepts.Set flatten()
      Flatten this set of concepts. This will convert any union of concepts into a set of concepts.
      Returns:
      a new set of concepts

    • getCodingTemplate

      @Nonnull CodingCollection getCodingTemplate()
      Gets the coding template for this set of concepts.
      Returns:
      the coding template

    • set

      @Nonnull static TerminologyConcepts set(@Nonnull ColumnRepresentation codingSet, @Nonnull CodingCollection codingTemplate)
      Create as new set of concepts where each coding is treated as an independent concept.
      Parameters:
      codingSet - the column representation of the set of concepts
      codingTemplate - the CodingCollection to use as a template for coding results
      Returns:
      a new set of concepts

    • union

      @Nonnull static TerminologyConcepts union(@Nonnull ColumnRepresentation codingUnion, @Nonnull CodingCollection codingTemplate)
      Create a new union of concepts.
      Parameters:
      codingUnion - the column representation of the union of concepts
      codingTemplate - the CodingCollection to use as a template for coding results
      Returns:
      a new union of concepts
